sense.name: marvel
sense.commentary: something that causes feelings of wonder
sense.examples: The wonders of modern science are responsible for our comfortable lifestyles. The pyramids are one of the seven wonders of the ancient world. That thing in your sink is a squishy wonder.

sense.name: curiosity
sense.commentary: WONDER[+event] wonderment, admiration - a state in which you want to learn more about something
sense.examples: The child's wonder would only occupy him for a short time. The green squishy thing in your sink creates wonder.
